com.communote.server.api.core.config

Class AbstractConfigurationProperties<T extends ConfigurationPropertyConstant>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.config.AbstractConfigurationProperties<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the types of properties
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationConfigurationProperties, ClientConfigurationProperties

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurationProperties<T extends ConfigurationPropertyConstant>
extends Object
    Abstract object that holds configuration properties.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • getAssertProperty

        public String getAssertProperty(T key)
        Get the property, throw a runtime exception if the key does not exist.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getProperty

        public abstract String getProperty(T key)
        Returns the property value for the key as String.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the property value or null if there is no property for the key

      • getProperty

        public boolean getProperty(T key,
                           boolean fallback)
        Returns the property for the key as boolean. 'true', 'on' or 'yes' (case insensitive) will return true. 'false', 'off' or 'no' (case insensitive) will return false. If none of these values is set the fallback will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        fallback - the fallback to return if there is no property for the key or the property cannot be converted to boolean.
        Returns:
        the property value or the fallback if there is no property for the key or it cannot be converted into a boolean

      • getProperty

        public int getProperty(T key,
                       int fallback)
        Returns the property for the key as integer.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        fallback - the fallback to return if there is no property for the key
        Returns:
        the property value or the fallback if there is no property for the key or it cannot be converted into an integer

      • getProperty

        public long getProperty(T key,
                        long fallback)
        Returns the property for the key as long.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        fallback - the fallback to return if there is no property for the key
        Returns:
        the property value or the fallback if there is no property for the key or it cannot be converted into a long

      • getProperty

        public String getProperty(T key,
                          String fallback)
        Returns the property for the key as string.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        fallback - the fallback to return if there is no property for the key
        Returns:
        the property value or the fallback if there is no property for the key
